message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to own a product that has been thoroughly tested and refined. While it may not be the best in the market, it still has some great features that I think you'll appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. What do you say?
I appreciate your offer, but given the uncertainty about the product quality, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.

Considering its premium quality, I'm confident you'll be extremely satisfied with this purchase. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. What do you think?
